entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Overcast. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the evening then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
